name: Saint James

topics.topic_text: What do you do around here?
topics.response_text: {saying the minimum, guarded}Me and Dermot work salvage around New Vegas.

topics.topic_text: Some people have gone missing, and they were last seen dealing with you.
topics.response_text: {irritated}I don't know a thing about no missing refugees from that Aerotech camp. Go cry to somebody else.

topics.topic_text: I found this ledger in Dermot's room.
topics.response_text: You got his book?{shouting for Dermot as you attack player}Dermot, this bastard got your book! He got your book!

topics.topic_text: Look what I found in your room. <Show him the teddy bear.>
topics.response_text: {unstable, bungling your lies}What you doing stealing my stuff? That ain't even mine. I mean it's mine, but it's private. Give it back!
{bungling your lie}Yeah, well, I must've heard rumors, and, uh...{losing patience}fuck you! You got nothing on me and Dermot.

topics.topic_text: Tell me about Dermot, your partner.
topics.response_text: {unstable and not especially bright}What do you even mean? He's Dermot.

topics.topic_text: I hear you spend most of your caps on Sweetie.
topics.response_text: That's private. I don't go asking about how you like to get laid, and I don't wanna know. Enough of that.

description:
Saint James is a 48 year-old African American Male.

Saint James is a middle-aged man with a troubled past, now operating as a slaver in the Westside district of New Vegas. He has a wiry build, with tired eyes that betray his inner turmoil. His appearance is unkempt, with a five-o'clock shadow and clothes that show signs of long wear. Despite his outward appearance, there's a cold calculating intelligence behind his eyes when discussing business.

Saint James's Personality: Saint James exhibits signs of severe psychosis, making him unpredictable and dangerous. He is manipulative and cunning, able to maintain a facade of normalcy when needed. Beneath this facade lies a deeply disturbed individual with a dark obsession for children, which he struggles to control. His partnership with Dermot is one of necessity, as Dermot helps manage his darkest impulses with the promise of rewards and threats of exposure.

Saint James's Backstory: Saint James was once a prospector, searching the Mojave Wasteland for valuable pre-War artifacts and resources. He partnered with Dermot, a fellow scavenger with a more pragmatic approach to survival. While initially content with their honest work, James grew disillusioned with the meager rewards and the constant danger of their profession. It was Dermot who first suggested they expand their operations into more lucrative, albeit illegal, activities. Their first foray into slavery was opportunisticâ€”they came across a group of refugees fleeing New Vegas and saw an opportunity for profit. The ease with which they captured and sold their first batch of 'merchandise' to the Fiends emboldened them, and they soon established a regular operation. James's descent into darkness was gradual, but his inherent instability made him particularly susceptible to the moral corruption of their new lifestyle. The breaking point came when they kidnapped a little blonde girl from one of the missing families at Aerotech Office Park. Dermot, recognizing James's dangerous obsession, used the girl's teddy bear as a bargaining chip. The bear became James's obsession, a twisted symbol of the innocence he craved but could never have.
